summary: A utility script that retrieves the LibriTTS corpus from the OpenSLR repository, extracts the archive, and consolidates all normalized transcription files into a single text file while also generating a list of corresponding audio file paths, ready for use in punctuation and capitalization token‑classification models.
business_intent: Enable rapid preparation of a high‑quality speech‑text dataset for training and evaluating NLP models that perform punctuation and capitalization tasks on audio inputs.
